definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Tense negotiations were under way in the State Department conference room.
sentences.chinese: 在國務院會議廳裏，正進行着激烈的協商。

sentences.english: The large meeting hall is three-quarters full.
sentences.chinese: 大會議廳的四分之三被坐滿。

sentences.english: After I crossed the threshold of the conference hall, I collapsed in the university hallway.
sentences.chinese: 跨過會議廳的門檻後，我就倒在了大學的走廊裏。

sentences.english: A new subsystem building doubles as a meeting hall and the island's first visitor center.
sentences.chinese: 一座子系統建築兼做會議廳和島上第一個遊客中心。

sentences.english: A number of different styles of small and medium-sized conference room.
sentences.chinese: 多個不同風格的中小型會議廳。

sentences.english: The Hyundai Capital Convention Hall is a space that is designed as an experience.
sentences.chinese: 現代投資會議廳是一處以體驗爲旨歸的空間。

sentences.english: Stairs-shaped international meeting hall is decorated with light-gray carpet and softly-covered wall.
sentences.chinese: 階梯式國際會議廳配以淺灰色的地毯與軟包牆面。

sentences.english: These portraits are now displayed at the Institute in the gallery in our conference room.
sentences.chinese: 這些照片正陳列在研究所會議廳的走廊上。

sentences.english: Attendees' badge must be worn in order to enter any conference rooms.
sentences.chinese: 若要進出會議廳聆聽議程，請務必配戴會衆識別證。

sentences.english: The door to the divan was wide open.
The seminar was held in the conference room of AACM's office.
sentences.chinese: 是次研討會於民航局辦事處會議廳舉行。

sentences.english: There are a small meeting Room and one multi-functional conference hall for 200 people.
sentences.chinese: 設有小會議室可容納200人的多功能會議廳。

sentences.english: Can accommodate 400 people use the multi-purpose conference room.
sentences.chinese: 可同時容納400人使用的多功能會議廳。

sentences.english: The lobby of Tbilisi'smain hotel resembled a United Nations conference.
sentences.chinese: 第比利斯最大的旅館的大廳簡直成了聯合國的會議廳。

definition: the Jockey Club, Hong Kong philanthropic organization (and former gentleman's club)
Dounan or Tounan town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
Neipu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Wutai township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
